name: Car Trials: Crash Course Driver
description:
What better way to try out the newest, high performance cars than to take them for a drive on a race track? The courses in the game will allow you to push the available vehicles to their limits. Test their maximum speed on wide roads, check how well they handle on narrow obstacle courses. Make huge jumps and see if you can land safely. Most importantly, remember to park when you're finished.

Prove yourself as one of the best drivers in the world! Each of the ten available cars comes with its own set of challenges. You will be driving fast, maneuverable sports cars - but that's not all. You will also get to sit behind the wheel of a powerful 4x4 or a rally car.

10 DIFFERENT VEHICLES
All of the vehicles available in the game share one cruicial detail - they are top of the line, high performance cars well suited to breaking all kinds of records. The actual task of doing that will, of course, be up to you.

DEMANDING RACE TRACKS
Every mission takes place in a carefully crafted course, which sole purpose is to test your driving skill and let you try out the best cars available. Discover and complete all of them.

50 VARIED MISSIONS
Completing missions in a perfect time will earn you money that you can use to buy new vehicles and unlock additional challenges. Play, practice, don't give up and you will be able to finish all of them.

FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!

GAME FEATURES
- IMPRESSIVE CAR COLLECTION : Drive 10 Awesome Cars
- PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progres
- 100% Free to Play Missions
- CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel, Tilt & MFi Game Controller Support
- CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion
- iCLOUD: Supports play between your devices & automatic progress backup with iCloud
